verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> either <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall separate <S%H6381><s%> themselves to vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> of a Nazarite, <S%H5139><s%> to separate <S%H5144><s%> themselves to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

He shall separate <S%H5144><s%> himself from wine <S%H3196><s%> and strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> and shall drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> or vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he drink <S%H8354><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> liquor <S%H4952><s%> of grapes, <S%H6025><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> moist <S%H3892><s%> grapes, <S%H6025><s%> or dried. <S%H3002><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> shall he eat <S%H398><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> of the vine <S%H3196><s%> tree, from the kernels <S%H2785><s%> even to the husk. <S%H2085><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the vow <S%H5088><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> razor <S%H8593><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> on his head: <S%H7218><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> be fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> in the which <S%H834><s%> he separates <S%H5144><s%> himself to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he shall be holy, <S%H6918><s%> and shall let the locks <S%H6545><s%> of the hair <S%H8181><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> grow. <S%H1431><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that he separates <S%H5144><s%> himself to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> at no <S%H3808><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> body. <S%H5315><s%>

He shall not make himself unclean <S%H2930><s%> for his father, <S%H1><s%> or for his mother, <S%H517><s%> for his brother, <S%H251><s%> or for his sister, <S%H269><s%> when they die: <S%H4194><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the consecration <S%H5145><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is on his head. <S%H7218><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> he is holy <S%H6918><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> any man die <S%H4191><s%> very <S%H6621><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> by him, and he has defiled <S%H2930><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his consecration; <S%H5145><s%> then he shall shave <S%H1548><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his cleansing, <S%H2893><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall he shave <S%H1548><s%> it.

And on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall bring <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtles, <S%H8449><s%> or <S%H176><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him, for that he sinned <S%H2398><s%> by the dead, <S%H5315><s%> and shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And he shall consecrate <S%H5144><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation, <S%H5145><s%> and shall bring <S%H935><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a trespass <S%H817><s%> offering: but the days <S%H3117><s%> that were before <S%H7223><s%> shall be lost, <S%H5307><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> his separation <S%H5145><s%> was defiled. <S%H2930><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazarite, <S%H5139><s%> when the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> are fulfilled: <S%H4390><s%> he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> he lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and one <S%H259><s%> ewe <S%H3535><s%> lamb <S%H3535><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> for peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings,

And a basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and wafers <S%H7550><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and their meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and shall offer <S%H6213><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and his burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering:

And he shall offer <S%H6213><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread: the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> also his meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> shall shave <S%H1548><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and shall take <S%H3947><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation, <S%H5145><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it in the fire <S%H784><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the sodden <S%H1311><s%> shoulder <S%H2220><s%> of the ram, <S%H352><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> out of the basket, <S%H5536><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafer, <S%H7550><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on the hands <S%H3709><s%> of the Nazarite, <S%H5139><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the hair of his separation <S%H5145><s%> is shaven: <S%H1548><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%> for the priest, <S%H3548><s%> with the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder: <S%H7785><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> may drink <S%H8354><s%> wine. <S%H3196><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has vowed, <S%H5087><s%> and of his offering <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for his separation, <S%H5145><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> that that his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall get: <S%H5381><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to the vow <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he vowed, <S%H5087><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he must do <S%H6213><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> of his separation. <S%H5145><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> On this <S%H3541><s%> wise you shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> to them,
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and keep <S%H8104><s%> you:
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> make his face <S%H6440><s%> shine <S%H215><s%> on you, and be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to you:
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up his countenance <S%H6440><s%> on you, and give <S%H7760><s%> you peace. <S%H7965><s%>
And they shall put <S%H7760><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> them.
